dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5773 IH: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to extend certain provisions relating to multiemployer defined benefit pension plans.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Crowley introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to extend certain provisions relating to multiemployer defined benefit pension plans.

section.header: Extension of automatic extension of amortization periods

subsection.header: Amendment to Internal Revenue Code of 1986
subsection.text: Subparagraph (C) of section 431(d)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking December 31, 2014 and inserting December 31, 2015.

subsection.header: Amendment to Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974
subsection.text: Subparagraph (C) of section 304(d)(1) of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (29 U.S.C. 1084(d)(1)(C)) is amended by striking December 31, 2014 and inserting December 31, 2015.

The amendments made by this section shall apply to applications submitted under section 431(d)(1)(A) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and section 304(d)(1)(C) of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 after December 31, 2014.

section.header: Extension of funding improvement and rehabilitation plan rules

subsection.text: Paragraphs (1) and (2) of section 221(c) of the Pension Protection Act of 2006 are each amended by striking December 31, 2014 and inserting December 31, 2015.
Paragraph (2) of section 221(c) of the Pension Protection Act of 2006 is amended by striking January 1, 2015 and inserting January 1, 2016.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to plan years beginning after December 31, 2014.
